intro.description:
This cheat sheet shows you how to install the RAP runtime target platform in order to build web applications the eclipse way.
As RAP is a platform itself it can't be installed in top of you existing eclipse installation. We will help you to install RAP separately.
Click the ? button if you want to know more about target platforms.

item.title: Installing target
item.description: Now let's install the target. If you already have it installed, you can switch this step. If not, it is required to install the target before running the demo or developing plugins on top of RAP.

item.title: Testing the demo...
item.description: To test the just installed target we need a demo. RAP already provides a simple demo application. To import it, click the Perform link, select Projects with source folders and choose the org.eclipse.rap.demo plugin on the next page.

item.title: ...and launching it
item.description: To launch the web application we just need to run the bundled launch configration. Go to Run | Run or click Perform.
